title: DiceDB
description: A CS engineer passionate about Databases, Language Internals, Distributed Datastores, and Advanced Algorithms. I am currently working with Google as a Staff Software with the Dataproc team in making Apache Spark faster.

featureHighlights.title: Speaks Redis
featureHighlights.description: a drop-in replacement of Redis; if you know Redis, you know DiceDB.

featureHighlights.title: Faster and Efficient Redis
featureHighlights.description: 5x faster than Redis and can handle much larger workloads on a single machine.

featureHighlights.title: SQL support
featureHighlights.description: fire SQL queries and query your most crucial data at ultra low latency.

featureHighlights.title: Push and pull, both
featureHighlights.description: fire a SQL query like always, or watch it and get results pushed to you in real-time.

featureHighlights.title: Native JSON support
featureHighlights.description: native, first-class JSON support for reads, writes, and queries.

featureHighlights.title: Sub-millisecond latencies
featureHighlights.description: in-memory, no disk overhead, and every operation completes within 1 ms.

featureHighlights.title: Built for modern hardware
featureHighlights.description: squeezes every single ounce of performance from all the cores with zero contention.

featureHighlights.title: HTTP and WebSockets
featureHighlights.description: want your clients to talk to database? great! we natively support both HTTP and WebSocket.

aboutDiceDB.title: Why did we call it DiceDB?
